summary: Office represents a workspace concept that blends productivity with enjoyment. It encompasses the idea of transforming play into meaningful work, fostering creativity, and problem-solving skills. This approach involves analyzing living systems, creating digital patterns, and converting values into actionable rules. The office environment encourages simulating ecosystems, debugging rule systems, and ultimately releasing control to promote adaptability and growth. It emphasizes the importance of purpose, impact, teamwork, and continuous learning, creating a space where work becomes an engaging and fulfilling experience.
excerpt: The journey from Play to Work involves dissecting living systems, engineering digital patterns, and transforming values into rules. It progresses through simulating ecosystems and debugging rule systems, fostering creativity and problem-solving skills.
